body.p: IFRS 9 is a new Standard that deals with the accounting for financial instruments. When developing IFRS 9, the IASB considered the responses to its 2009 Exposure Draft Financial Instruments: Classification and Measurement (the ‘2009 Classification and Measurement Exposure Draft’).
